Posts.Content: Aug 5, 2015 05:55AM VLT wrote: Yes, I'll be counted, I'm still here. I've been gone from here for a long time. I recently found An article written in the NY Times about a 17 year stage 4 survivor that has brought me back. Glad to be here. Dx 1998 IDC 2.5 mm tumor, Er+Pr+Her2- grade2b no nodes Dx 2012 Advanced Stage 4 with bone mets on 75% of bones including scull and face.
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? DivineMrsM kt1966
